title: Three Ideas for Lowering Electricity Costs
description: For starters, recognize that clean energy is cheap energy.
content: Electricity prices are becoming an outsize issue in American politics because they themselves are legitimately outsize. Compared with the cost of consumer goods, which have been rising rapidly over t… [+7952 chars]
